name: Long Toolkit
author: longbsvnu

sections.description:
Long Toolkit Fields provides for developers basic and advanced fields in:
1. Taxonomy custom fields
2. Metabox custom fields
3. Customizer fields
4. Menu Meta fields
5. Widget Fields
sections.installation: 1. Simply install as a normal WordPress plugin and activate.
sections.changelog:

  • Add rich editor for textarea type.

1.5 (May 29, 2019):

  • Initial Public Release

short_description: Create Admin fields, metabox, widget, taxonomy, menu meta, customizer fields quickly and friendly.
